animeTitle: Aniki no Yome-san nara, Ore ni Hamerarete Hiihii Itteru Tokoro Da yo
animeDescription: Two respected older brothers. Two beautiful, virtuous wives. The younger brother, a horndog who salivates at the chance to taste those wives.(Source: DLsite)
